Class BlackjackModel

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
blackjack.BlackjackModel
public class BlackjackModel extends Observable
This class contains the game logic for a Blackjack game
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aidin Miller

  • Method Details

    • start

      public boolean start(int bet1, int bet2)
      Starts a new round of Blackjack
      Parameters:
      bet1 - Player 1's bet amount
      bet2 - Player 2's bet amount
      Returns:
      true if the game starts, false otherwise

    • deal

      private Card deal()
      This function deals a card from the deck
      Returns:
      the card that was dealt

      This function deals a card to the current player

      private void updateMoney(int whichPlayer)
      This function calculates the earnings for the given player
      Parameters:
      whichPlayer - an int representing which player to calculate

      Parameters:
      boo - true if over, false otherwise

    • isP1Done

      public boolean isP1Done()
      This function checks to see if player 1 finished
      Returns:
      true if player 1 is done, false otherwise

    • isP2Done

      public boolean isP2Done()
      This function checks to see if player 2 finished
      Returns:
      true if player 2 is done, false otherwise

    • getTurn

      public int getTurn()
      Gets the current turn
      Returns:
      1 if player 1, 2 if player 2, 0 otherwise

    • canDouble

      public boolean canDouble(int player)
      Checks if the current player can double down
      Parameters:
      player - 1 for Player 1, 2 for Player 2
      Returns:
      true if player can double down, false otherwise

      public void doubleDown()

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus(int player)
      This function checks the current status of the player
      Parameters:
      player - 1 for player 1, 2 for player 2
      Returns:
      a string representing whether a player lost or won

    • getInstance

      public BlackjackInstance getInstance()
      Gets an instance of the game for saving
      Returns:
      a BlackjackInstance of the current game state

      public void setInstance(BlackjackInstance i)
      Restores the game state
      Parameters:
      i - the BlackjackInstance to restore from
